text: Widowspeak is the debut album by Widowspeak, released in 2011 by Captured Tracks. At Metacritic, which assigns a normalised rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream critics, Widowspeak received an average score of 75, based on 10 reviews, indicating "generally favorable reviews". ==Track listing== #"Puritan" #"Harsh Realm" #"Nightcrawlers" #"In the Pines" #"Limbs" #"Gun Shy" #"Hard Times" #"Fir Coat" #"Half Awake" #"Ghost Boy" ==References== == External links == Category:2011 debut albums Category:Captured Tracks albums
title: Widowspeak (Widowspeak album)
